OBXml:
check process jenkins_master
with pidfile /var/vcap/sys/run/jenkins_master/pid start program "/var/vcap/jobs/jenkins_master/bin/ctl start" stop program "/var/vcap/jobs/jenkins_master/bin/ctl stop" group vcap
with pidfile /var/vcap/sys/run/jenkins_master/jenkins_master.pid start program "/var/vcap/jobs/jenkins_master/bin/monit_debugger jenkins_master_ctl '/var/vcap/jobs/jenkins_master/bin/jenkins_master_ctl start'" stop program "/var/vcap/jobs/jenkins_master/bin/monit_debugger jenkins_master_ctl '/var/vcap/jobs/jenkins_master/bin/jenkins_master_ctl stop'" group vcap
with pidfile /var/vcap/sys/run/jenkins_master/jenkins_master.pid start program "/var/vcap/jobs/jenkins_master/bin/monit_debugger jenkins_master_ctl '/var/vcap/jobs/jenkins_master/bin/jenkins_master_ctl start'" with timeout 120 seconds stop program "/var/vcap/jobs/jenkins_master/bin/monit_debugger jenkins_master_ctl '/var/vcap/jobs/jenkins_master/bin/jenkins_master_ctl stop'" group vcap
check process haproxy with pidfile /var/vcap/sys/run/jenkins_master/haproxy.pid start program "/var/vcap/jobs/jenkins_master/bin/monit_debugger haproxy_ctl '/var/vcap/jobs/jenkins_master/bin/haproxy_ctl start'" stop program "/var/vcap/jobs/jenkins_master/bin/monit_debugger haproxy_ctl '/var/vcap/jobs/jenkins_master/bin/haproxy_ctl stop'" group vcap
check process nginx_jenkins_master with pidfile /var/vcap/sys/run/jenkins_master/nginx.pid start program "/var/vcap/jobs/jenkins_master/bin/monit_debugger jenkins_master_nginx_ctl '/var/vcap/jobs/jenkins_master/bin/nginx_ctl start'" stop program "/var/vcap/jobs/jenkins_master/bin/monit_debugger jenkins_master_nginx_ctl '/var/vcap/jobs/jenkins_master/bin/nginx_ctl stop'" group vcap
<% if p("route_registrar.enabled") %> check process route_registrar with pidfile /var/vcap/sys/run/jenkins_master/route_registrar.pid start program "/var/vcap/jobs/jenkins_master/bin/monit_debugger route_registrar_ctl '/var/vcap/jobs/jenkins_master/bin/route_registrar_ctl start'" with timeout 10 seconds stop program "/var/vcap/jobs/jenkins_master/bin/monit_debugger route_registrar_ctl '/var/vcap/jobs/jenkins_master/bin/route_registrar_ctl stop'" with timeout 10 seconds group vcap <% end %>
